1.0.name: wordpress/cropnote
1.0.description: This plugin allows you and your users to add textual annotations to images on your blog by selecting a region of the image and typing in the text. Image notes will then show up as small boxes that display the text on mouseover. Based on Demon Image Annotation by demonisblack, which is based on jQuery Image Annotation
